Description: In OpenCRM, you have all the tools you need to run your business from a single system. From your Sales Process to Customer Service right through to your Email Marketing, it’s all right here at your fingertips.
Name: OpenCRM

Methods.Name: Get Contact By ID
Methods.Description: Retrieves the specified contact by ID.

Methods.Name: List New Contacts
Methods.Description: Retrieves contacts created since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: Retrieves contacts updated since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: Get Contact By Email
Methods.Description: Retrieves the specified contact by email address.

Methods.Name: Get Company By ID
Methods.Description: Retrieves the specified Company by ID.
